description.en: A ProductionEquipmentCategory can be described using a name.
A ProductionEquipmentCategory can have an additional textual description.

A ProductionEquipmentCategory represents a certain category of production equipment in terms of its static properties (e.g. a certain model and brand). Each ProductionEquipmentCategory can have multiple related ProductionEquipment, which represent the actual individual machines. Moreover, each ItemCategory can be produced by multiple ProductionEquipmentCategories.
